alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 24 at 12:55AM CDT until September 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR PITTSBURG COUNTY... At 1254 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles south of Blocker to 5 miles south of Alderson to 4 miles northeast of Wardville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Arpelar... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
